SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT T.DATE_MEKORI, sum(CASE WHEN :1 OR T.STATUS_TASHLUM = 0 THEN T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT ELSE T.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH END) AS Amount_Owed ,cast (sum(CASE WHEN T.STATUS_TASHLUM IN ( 5 ,6 ,7 ) THEN CASE WHEN :1 OR T.STATUS_TASHLUM = 0 THEN T.SUM_TASHLUM_W_RIBIT ELSE T.SUM_TASHLUM_SHACH END ELSE 0 END) as decimal (8,2)) AS Amount_Paid FROM A_TASHLUMIM T WHERE T.NUMERATOR_TIK = :2 GROUP By T.DATE_MEKORI

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToHTML(0,'תאריך מקורי,סה"כ חייב,סה"כ שילם'HEB,'תאריך מקורי,סה"כ חייב,סה"כ שילם'HEB,{0,6},'',2)

SQL_STMT_U.val: SELECT T.DATE_MEKORI ,sum(CASE WHEN T.TZURAT_TASHLUM = 5 THEN 0 ELSE T.Total END) AS Amount_Owed ,cast(sum(CASE WHEN T.STATUS_TASHLUM IN ( 5 ,6 ,7 ) THEN T.Total ELSE 0 END) AS DECIMAL(8, 2)) AS Amount_Paid FROM V_Loan_Payments T WHERE T.NUMERATOR_TIK = :1 GROUP BY T.DATE_MEKORI

ExpSyntax.val: DataViewToHTML(0,'תאריך מקורי,סה"כ חייב,סה"כ שילם'HEB,'תאריך מקורי,סה"כ חייב,סה"כ שילם'HEB,{0,6},'',2)
